resources.string: the users should search their favourite songs. When they like their music,they could buy them.
Total Eclipse of the Heart Bonnie Tyler
I Will Always Love You Whitney Houston
In this screen the users could select their searching songs.
through this screen the users could buy theie favorite songs.
Now the users could listen to their favourite songs the play button should play the songs, the stop botton could stop the song, and the pause button could pause the song"
The users could select their favourite romantic musics by clicking on each music it plays!
The users could select their favourite pop musics by clicking on each music it plays!

playlist Screen.This screen shows the library of the users. By clicking any of the playList categories, the nowPlaying opens through an explicit intent and choose their favourite song which are listed
